base_command_dj_only: This command is for DJ users only.
base_command_dj_or_admin: This command is for DJ users, or users with Admin permission.
base_interaction_error_occurred: An error occurred while executing the {interactionObject}.
base_cooldown:
You must wait **{remainingTime}**s before using this command again.
Your cooldown: **{cooldown}**s
vc_user_absent: 💢 You are not in a voice channel.
vc_user_different: 💢 You are not in the same voice channel as me.
paused: ⏸️ Paused the player. Use ``/pause`` again to resume.
search_age_restricted: 💢❌ This video is age restricted and cannot be played in a non-nsfw channel.
missing_permissions: It seems like I am missing the required permissions to use music features. Please ensure I am allowed to Connect, Speak, and view voice channels in this server.
no_songs: There are no songs in the queue. 🚫
all_users_gone: All users have left the voice channel. The player has been stopped.
error_music: An error occurred while trying to play music. Please try again later or contact the developer if errors persist.
no_previous: ⏪ There is no previous song to play.
no_current_queue: 🔇 There is no music currently being played.
queue_embed_toomany:
```diff
- Only showing the first {count} songs 
+ You can use /export to export the whole queue
```
already_joined: 💢 I am already in a voice channel!
could_not_join: ❌ I could not join the voice channel. Please ensure I have the required permissions to join and speak in the channel.
volume_syntax: ‼️ The volume cannot be higher than 100.
shuffle_too_few: ❌ You need at least 3 songs in the queue to shuffle.
export_error: ⚠️ Error exporting. Please ensure you have DMs enabled in this server.
export_success: ✅ Successfully exported the queue. Check your DMs.
remove_success: ✅🗑 Removed {song} at index {index} from the queue.
filter_invalid: ❌ Invalid filter. Please use the filter command without any arguments to see a list of available filters.
dj_requirement_already_enabled: 💢 DJ role requirement is already enabled.
dj_requirement_already_disabled: 💢 DJ role requirement is already disabled.
dj_role_list_empty: There are no DJ roles set.
lang_reset: ✅ Successfully reset the language to the default language.
